Package Model

package Model
This package contains the data models and related exceptions used in the Students Diary application. It includes classes for students, grades, and custom exceptions for managing application-specific errors. Key classes: - MainMenu - Represents main menu of the program - Student - Represents a student in the application. - Grade - Represents a grade assigned to a student. - StudentList - Manages the collection of students. - MessagePrinter - Utility class for printing messages to the console. Key exceptions: - StudentAlreadyExistsException - Thrown when attempting to add a student that already exists. - StudentNotFoundException - Thrown when a student cannot be found. - InvalidGradeFormatException - Thrown when a grade has an invalid format. - InvalidGradeIndexException - Thrown when an invalid index is used for a grade operation.
  • Class
    Description
    Grade
    The Grade class represents a student's grade, including the value of it, the teacher who gave the grade, and the subject.
    InvalidGradeFormatException
    Exception thrown when an invalid grade format is encountered.
    InvalidGradeIndexException
    Exception thrown when an invalid index is provided for accessing a student's grades.
    MainMenu
    Model class representing the main menu options.
    MessagePrinter
    MessagePrinter class used to print error and success messages in the catch statement and in controller classes
    Student
    The Student class represents a student with a unique ID, name, surname, and a list of grades.
    StudentAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when student with specified ID already exists.
    StudentList
    The StudentList class manages a list of students and provides methods to add, remove, and find students.
    StudentNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a student with a specific ID cannot be found in the student list.
